page.title: 17LEISURE IN BURGHFIELD
page.content: In Burghfield there aren't many shops. Lots of people use private transport to get to shops like Savacentre and Waitrose. The only shop in Burghfield is the mobile shop which comes once a week. The most popular hobbies of the ladies in Burghfield are gardening, cookery, embroidery, knitting and walking. If there was a leisure centre in Burghfield there would be less vandalism. In Burghfield there are lots of small clubs for ladies. Some are for a chat and some are for talking about special subjects. Most people in Burghfield like the countryside and do not mind travelling to shops. Most people would not like Burghfield if it was built up too much.
